name: ordao-sc-deployment
description: Scripts to manage deployment of ORDAO contracts

scripts.deploy-op-sepolia-1: npx hardhat ignition deploy --parameters $npm_package_config_op_sepolia_1_params --deployment-id op-sepolia-1 --network opSepolia ignition/modules/Ordao.ts
scripts.deploy-op-sepolia-1-reset: npx hardhat ignition deploy --parameters $npm_package_config_op_sepolia_1_params --deployment-id op-sepolia-1 --reset --network opSepolia ignition/modules/Ordao.ts
scripts.verify-op-sepolia-1: npm run copy-orec-dbg && npm run copy-respect1155-dbg && mkdir -p ignition/deployments/build-info && npm run copy-orec-buildinfo && npm run copy-respect1155-buildinfo && npx hardhat ignition verify op-sepolia-1
scripts.deploy-of: npx hardhat ignition deploy --parameters $npm_package_config_of_params --deployment-id of --network optimism ignition/modules/Ordao.ts
scripts.deploy-of-reset: npx hardhat ignition deploy --parameters $npm_package_config_of_params --deployment-id of --reset --network optimism ignition/modules/Ordao.ts
scripts.verify-of-ignition: npm run copy-orec-dbg-of && npm run copy-respect1155-dbg-of && mkdir -p ignition/deployments/build-info && npm run copy-orec-buildinfo && npm run copy-respect1155-buildinfo && npx hardhat ignition verify of --include-unrelated-contracts

author: sim31
